alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 9:28PM CDT until April 01 at 7:18AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Monroe, Wilcox and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Millers Ferry Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 66.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Friday was 68.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 42.8 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. &&
